lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo signed legislation that reopens the claims period; it will now run until Sept. 11, 2018.

headline.print_headline: Filing Dates for Workers at 9/11 Site Are Extended
headline.main: Period for Ground Zero Workers to Seek Compensation Is Extended

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo signed legislation that reopens the claims period; it will now run until Sept. 11, 2018....
abstract: New York State extends filing period for workers and volunteers seeking medical benefits and lost wages resulting from their involvement in rescue and recovery operations following September 11, 2001 attack to Sept 11, 2018.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: James Zadroga 9-11 Health and Compensation Act
